title: Norway Bow-and-Arrow Attack Investigated as Terrorism as Police Say Suspect Was Reported for Radicalization
content:
1. Norway Bow-and-Arrow Attack Investigated as Terrorism as Police Say Suspect Was Reported for Radicalization  The Wall Street Journal

localize.title: ノルウェーの弓矢による襲撃事件をテロとして捜査、容疑者は過激派として通報されていたと警察が発表
挪威弓箭手袭击事件被调查为恐怖主义，警方称嫌疑人曾因激进行为被举报
